name: The Island (Survival)
description:
(Version: V0.4.4)

Hi! Welcome to the game "The Island". This is just a Beta, Please enter a suggestion in the comment!

✉️ Note: This game can be played in mobile.

✨ How to play ⭐:

1. Tap material (Wood, Stone, Iron...) ☝️

2. Use your material to craft new item (Furnace, Pickaxe...) Note: to go to the craft menu, click the hammer button in the inventory.  ⛺️

3. Level up to get more materials & ores! ✨

⚡️ TURBOWARP MODE: https://turbowarp.org/674649225/fullscreen

❤️ Like and favorite if your enjoyed! ⭐️
